'''Skin Pack 3''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 45 skins referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games. It is exclusive to the {{editions|ps3|ps4|psvita}} of ''Minecraft'', as well as ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' on PlayStation 4.
